name: GrimReviver
description:
Its opposite day for the Grimreaper  Grimm Reviver

Bring all the dead people back to life to build up score but beware...

They don't like to be woken up!!!

Instructions:

  • Start is exit & exit is start
  • Use 'wasd' to move
  • Mouse to aim, 'lmb' to fire
  • Lowest score wins
